attributes.action: Follow Poland and Legalise Street Racing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following an article on Yahoo, of the successful legalisation of street racing within Poland.

The idea would best brought over to this country to try to reduce the number of road deaths by illegal racing. The system can be regulated by government and would reduce the burden on local constabularies and police forces during the weekends.

Specific streets could be closed to the public and authorised events set up to promote the scheme. 

The performance modified car scene has produced millions of pounds of revenue in recent years and the goverment could tap into this resource. 

The scheme could be used to promote safer driving in the long run.
